objection_handlers.response: Moderate UV exposure following FDA guidelines is different from overexposure. We provide skin type analysis, controlled timing, and protective eyewear. Many dermatologists actually prescribe UV therapy for certain conditions. Indoor tanning allows controlled exposure versus unpredictable outdoor sun.

objection_handlers.objection: It's too expensive for a temporary result
objection_handlers.response: At $40/month unlimited, that's less than one dinner out. Your tan lasts as long as you maintain it, and the confidence boost affects every area of your life. Compare to $100+ spray tans that last only a week. We also offer session packages starting at just $20.

objection_handlers.objection: I don't have time for regular sessions
objection_handlers.response: Sessions are just 8-20 minutes - less time than a lunch break. We're open 7am-9pm seven days a week, offer online booking, and you can tan on your schedule. Our express beds give same results in half the time. Most clients tan just 2-3 times weekly.

objection_handlers.objection: I'm worried about looking orange or fake
objection_handlers.response: That's old technology. Our modern equipment provides natural-looking results. We customize your program based on skin type, use combination UV spectrum for natural color, and our trained staff prevents overexposure. Look at our staff - all have natural-looking, beautiful tans.

objection_handlers.objection: I burn easily and can't tan
objection_handlers.response: That's exactly why professional guidance matters. We start with short 3-5 minute sessions, use lower-pressure beds for sensitive skin, provide tingle-free lotions with bronzers, and gradually build your melanin. 92% of 'can't tan' clients achieve color safely with our protocols.

Self-care isn't vanity - it's mental health. Studies show UV exposure increases endorphins and Vitamin D, improving mood and energy. Many clients come for the wellness benefits, not just appearance. We also offer red light therapy for anti-aging if traditional tanning isn't preferred.
